sqlMap.select: select c.cmaterialvid as productCode, c.pk_contract_b as pkContractB, c.pk_contract as pkContract, c.norigmny as amount, c.nnum as num, c.vbdef36 as grossProfit, c.vbdef30 as grossRate, 1 as type from et_contract_b c, et_contract p where c.pk_contract = p.pk_contract AND cfirstid != '~' AND c.dr = 0 AND p.dr = 0 AND p.fpfstatusflag = 1 AND p.frevisestatusflag =-1 AND p.fstatusflag = 8 AND p.ctrantypeid = '1001D2100000001X2A1S' and c.frowstatusflag = 0 union all select nc.cmaterialvid as productCode, nc.pk_contract_b as pkContractB, nc.pk_contract as pkContract, nc.norigmny as amount, nc.nnum as num, nc.vbdef36 as grossProfit, nc.vbdef30 as grossRate, 2 as type from ent_contract_b nc, ent_contract np where nc.pk_contract = np.pk_contract AND nc.vfirstcode != '~' AND nc.dr = 0 AND np.dr = 0 AND np.fpfstatusflag = 1 AND np.frevisestatusflag =-1 AND np.fstatusflag = 8 AND np.ctrantypeid = '1001D2100000001X2A2Y' and nc.frowstatusflag =0
